Title: Chapter 12
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Gina Gionfriddo, Beau Willimon, Sam Forman (staff writer), Kate Barnow (story editor)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Kate Mara, Michael Kelly
Plot: The President sends Frank to St. Louis to persuade Raymond Tusk into becoming the new Vice President. Zoe and Janine investigate Peter Russo's death.
